Serialized Form

  • Package propra22.q8493367.draw.view

    • Class propra22.q8493367.draw.view.DrawPanel

      class DrawPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • animationIsShown
          boolean animationIsShown
          True, if the animation is running.
        • convexHullIsShown
          boolean convexHullIsShown
          True, if the convexHull is shown.
        • diameter
          IDiameter diameter
          The diameter.
        • diameterIsShown
          boolean diameterIsShown
          True, if diameter is shown.
        • drawPanelListener
          IDrawPanelListener drawPanelListener
          The draw panel listener.
        • hull
          IHull hull
          The hull.
        • initialDragX
          double initialDragX
          The x coordinate of the mouse when dragging starts.
        • initialDragY
          double initialDragY
          The y coordinate of the mouse when dragging starts.
        • innerOffsetX
          double innerOffsetX
          The innerOffsetX is used to center a set of points which is loaded from a file on the draw panel.
        • innerOffsetY
          double innerOffsetY
          The innerOffsetY is used to center a set of points which is loaded from a file on the draw panel.
        • mouseOffsetX
          double mouseOffsetX
          The x coordinate of the mouse minus initialDragX.
        • mouseOffsetY
          double mouseOffsetY
          The y coordinate of the mouse minus initialDragY.
        • outerOffsetX
          double outerOffsetX
          The outerOffsetX which is used for zooming and dragging the panel (after dragging the panel, the mouseOffsetX is added to the outerOffsetX and then set to 0).
        • outerOffsetY
          double outerOffsetY
          The outerOffsetY which is used for zooming and dragging the panel (after dragging the panel, the mouseOffsetY is added to the outerOffsetY and then set to 0).
        • panelScale
          double panelScale
          The scale of the draw panel. This scale is used to adapt the size of the content, when the size of the draw panel is changed by the user.
        • pointSet
          IPointSet pointSet
          The point set.
        • quadrangle
          IQuadrangle quadrangle
          The quadrangle.
        • quadrangleIsShown
          boolean quadrangleIsShown
          True, if the quadrangle is shown.
        • quadrangleSequence
          QuadrangleSequence quadrangleSequence
          The quadrangle sequence.
        • referenceHeight
          double referenceHeight
          The original height is the reference width of the draw panel. It us used to calculate the value of the panelScale, when the user changes the size of the main window.
        • referenceWidth
          double referenceWidth
          The original width is the reference width of the draw panel. It us used to calculate the value of the panelScale, when the user changes the size of the main window.
        • scale
          double scale
          The scale for the zoom.
        • scaleFactor
          double scaleFactor
          The scale factor.
        • tangentPair
          TangentPair tangentPair
          The tangent pair.
        • triangleIsShown
          boolean triangleIsShown
          True, if the triangle is shown.

  • Package propra22.q8493367.main

    • Class propra22.q8493367.main.MainWindow

      class MainWindow extends JFrame implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • animationItem
          JCheckBoxMenuItem animationItem
          The animation item. By this item, the user can choose, if the animation should be shown
        • convexHullItem
          JCheckBoxMenuItem convexHullItem
          The convex hull item. By this item the user can choose if the convex hull should be shown.
        • diameterItem
          JCheckBoxMenuItem diameterItem
          The diameter item. By this item the user can choose, if the diameter should be shown.
        • drawPanel
          IDrawPanel drawPanel
          The draw panel.
        • mainWindowListener
          IMainWindowListener mainWindowListener
          The main window listener.
        • quadrangleItem
          JCheckBoxMenuItem quadrangleItem
          The quadrangle item. By this item the user can choose, if the quadrangle should be shown
        • redoItem
          JMenuItem redoItem
          The redo menu item. By this item the user can redo an undone command
        • triangleItem
          JCheckBoxMenuItem triangleItem
          The triangle item. By this item the user can choose, if the triangle should be shown.
        • undoItem
          JMenuItem undoItem
          The undo menu item. By this item the user can undo a command

    • Class propra22.q8493367.status.StatusBar

      class StatusBar extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • height
          int height
          The height of the status bar in pixels.
        • mouseCoordinates
          JLabel mouseCoordinates
          The label which displays the mouse coordinates.
        • numberLabel
          JLabel numberLabel
          The label which displays the number of points in the point set.
        • selectedPointCoordinates
          JLabel selectedPointCoordinates
          The label which displays the coordinates of the selected point.
